attributes.action: Bring back Mandatory National Service for 18-21 year olds
attributes.additional_details: I believe bringing back National Service will reduce crime, give young people a sense of ownership and pride and allow young people to gain valuable experiences they otherwise wouldn’t have had the opportunity to. It’s also a great way to meet people and gain good relationships with people from different backgrounds from different parts of the country.
attributes.background: Bring back Mandatory National Service for 18-21 year olds for a year of national service
